Name: Dead Cells

In the game environment, countless weapons, ammunition, various items, etc. are available to you. Each of your enemies has its own characteristics, and to eliminate them, you must use trial and error and identify their weaknesses.
Features of the game include 11 challenging stages, 50 types of weapons and ammunition, various and powerful characters and characters, and so on.

At the end of each stage of the game you have to fight with the big boss and destroy him to get to the next stage. As you progress in the game, you can upgrade your skills and release and use new weapons.

Name: Bayonetta
Description: Bayonetta is a third-person Action game developed by PlatinumGames and released by Sega. The creators of Bayonetta worked on their title for almost three years, and in the end they kept their promise; It means making a masterpiece and a good start for a good series. Bayonetta takes advantage of a fast and furious process that nails the player in front of the console. From the very beginning of the game, you can feel the lively feeling that the game director wants to convey to you.

The main character of the game is a woman with glasses called Bionta, who uses a lot of superhuman and extraordinary powers. He tries to use this power in a traditional and very old war between the races of wizards. These wizards, who are divided into several groups, try to gain valuable treasures by conquering and overcoming each other and to rule a part of the world.

Enemies in the game have a high level of artificial intelligence and it is only on the easy level of the game that you can easily overcome them. In terms of Combat, Bayonetta never lacks the games of its generation. Just like Devil May Cry, the many combos in the game amaze you. It is very unlikely that you will finish the game once and be able to figure out all the combos.

Perhaps the only drawback we can get from Bayonetta is its not-so-good graphics and low frame rate. Of course, according to the information obtained, this problem only exists on the PS3 version of the game, and in this review, our goal is the PS3 version of this game. In Witch Time mode, you can enjoy the game graphics the most. In this case, you will find time for a moment to see and enjoy the environment full of details and beauty that the creators have created for you. Amidst the lively and uninterrupted scenes of the game, this is a great turning point to calm the player's heart for a moment!

Name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
Description: Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is a war and action game released by Ubisoft in 2018 for PC.

This part of the game has several different endings. Before starting the game you have to choose the gender of your character which you are given two choices, Kassandra and Alexios. Both characters start the game as mercenaries from the generation of the Spartan king, Leonidas I.

They inherit the king's broken staff, which turns into a knife to give the player special abilities during the game and in battles. The game has a section for abilities from where you can unlock new abilities.

The abilities section includes three parts: Hunter, which enhances the player's archery skills, Warrior, which enhances the player's combat skills, and Assassin, which focuses on stealth. This version of the game includes the Gear system, and each part of the armor that the player wears has its own special status and capabilities.

Name: Assassin's Sreed Valhalla
Description: The year is 873 BC. Norway, one of the Vikings' headquarters, is preparing to open up and change the pages of history. The world is looking for new steps that will change the face of Europe forever. Assassin’s Creed Valhalla is an amazing journey into the heart of Viking rule, with a brave hero named Eivor and his brother Sigurd pursuing their tribal leadership in all-out attacks on Anglo-Saxon land and present-day England. Ubisoft has already released several versions of the Assassin's Creed franchise, and after traveling to London, France, ancient Egypt, and Greece, it's time to move on to the Viking era, with a new character with no traces of Assassin. Experience the UK.

The character of Eivor is a full-fledged and traditional Viking who, entering the land of England, experiences a complex battle with rival kingdoms such as East Angila and Marcia, all of which seek to destroy the Vikings and expel them from the area under their control. You will see big cities like London, Winchester and York, and of course a series of game stages are followed in Norway and the northern regions, the atmosphere of which is very different from England. Assassin’s Creed Valhalla, like previous versions, uses a parallel narrative line to the modern world, in which case you follow the story of a character named Leila Hassan, who previously appeared in Origins and Odyssey. The gameplay is the most important part of the game, which includes various story and sub-stages that provide you with more than 50 hours of content.

The game combat system is out of the traditional mode and any type of weapon in the environment can be used. The Vikings are known for using axes, and you can use a variety of weapons in Assassin’s Creed Valhalla. The main city of the game is one of the most attractive parts that you should pay special attention to. Initially, there will be only a few buildings and houses in the area, but you will be able to expand them, for example creating a blacksmith or expanding the headquarters to a castle. There are a variety of buildings such as museums, shipyards, fishing huts, etc., each of which can enhance the story of the game. By attending these places, you will meet new people who may have sub-stages for you, which is why it will be very difficult to complete this game completely.
Property: Assassin's Creed Vallaha game is visually very beautifully designed and all areas are shown in high detail. England's lush green forests are accompanied by seasonal rains that nail you together. There are many activities throughout the game, all of which are best designed, and it is not unreasonable to say that you are dealing with one of the best versions of Assassin's Creed.
